body:
Yo guys, I'm bored.
Ask me anything I suppose.
Will reply almost everything.
body_tagged:
Yo guys, I'm bored.
Ask me anything I suppose.
Will reply almost everything.
title: AMA - I'm bored

replies.body: Do you like tacos?
replies.body_tagged: Do you like tacos?

replies.body: What map was your favourite to build, and why?
replies.body_tagged: What map was your favourite to build, and why?

replies.body:
Hey.. I am done.
25 AMA's per hour is near, guys.
Anyways, 
How did you know Avicus?
replies.body_tagged:
Hey.. I am done.
25 AMA's per hour is near, guys.
Anyways, 
How did you know Avicus?

replies.body: We're all dead now.
replies.body_tagged: We're all dead now.

replies.body: NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!
replies.body_tagged: NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!

replies.body:
@HarryRules2002
Yeah I like tacos ;D

@HeloAmSpoderman_
Probably Justice I, these new feelings were unique ;D I was trying something I had never done before: Map Making.

@Emdon
Me and my best friend Meowfrees were looking for servers to play on, so she found MCZone and we decided to play Walls in there. Then when she got bored, I started playing other stuff by myself, like SG, Ghost Squadron, Skywars, Nebula, Nexus, etc. It was very fun :)

@akov27
Happy New Year!

@kycrafft
YEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEES!!!!!!
replies.body_tagged:
@HarryRules2002
Yeah I like tacos ;D

@HeloAmSpoderman_
Probably Justice I, these new feelings were unique ;D I was trying something I had never done before: Map Making.

@Emdon
Me and my best friend Meowfrees were looking for servers to play on, so she found MCZone and we decided to play Walls in there. Then when she got bored, I started playing other stuff by myself, like SG, Ghost Squadron, Skywars, Nebula, Nexus, etc. It was very fun :)

@akov27
Happy New Year!

@kycrafft
YEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEES!!!!!!

replies.body:
First of all : HAPPY NEW YEAR TO EVERYONE!
I hope you all had a wonderful 2014, and will continue to have a wonderful 2015. I know I will, since this is my last year in high school ;D

I still have one question for you monsieurgray.
Could you please check out my friend's ban appeal? We really want to play together and he misses the server alot. It would truly be a nice new year's present if you could look into his appeal. His MC name is mineblocker213

replies.body:
@akov27
Yeah! I like playing Terraria, Team Fortress 2, Borderlands 2, Final Fantasy games, Pokemon games, Mario games, and I used to play COD some time ago, however these times have ended for me.

@AsinKetjap
Yo, happy new year to you too! I hope your 2015 will be as great as you said!

I'm just a Moderator, therefore Ban Appeals are outta my reach m8. I'd recommend you to wait until you receive an answer from a Senior Staff Member though, asking for a faster answer could lower your chances of success!

@Slicorn
nise men
ya men
nise men

@kycrafft
nise men

@HarryRules2002
nise men

@ScriptingCookies
Swimming :D

Cookie

HAIL MONKEYSUN

Hard question, but I guess I'm picking Rendezvous III this time. Who understands me, I change favorite maps every time haha
nise men

Yes please!

@Emdon
Can't decide. Teal if Gray doesn't count, since it's a shade, not a color, but overall, Gray.

Probably Snow, Sky, Goldie, Frosted, JK, Cookies, Star, Upsoar (if he reapplies), Cupcake (if he reapplies), Slicorn (if he reapplies), I don't know man, many interesting people out there!

Star, enough said.

9999

replies.body: Are you the chosen one?

replies.body:
You have already done one AMA

LOCKING...

Jk, how hyped were you when your staff app was accepted, then your interveiw, then you became a mod, and survived reassesment?
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: do you support kim jong un's noble views? ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
replies.body_tagged: do you support kim jong un's noble views? ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

replies.body:
@kycrafft
Hell yeah!

@Spartemex
When it was accepted, I was really happy I was given a chance, and I was very very nervous for the interviews, you should've heard me making maaaany mistakes xD and mixing up words... When I was promoted to Mod, I had the "best reaction so far" according to Jozz haha, and when I survived the reassesment I was truly impressed and I was very thankful as well :)

@OctaviaAddiction
i think it nise men
replies.body_tagged:
